member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultTableNameResolver
member.summary: Implements the interface by resolving table names by making the type name plural and removing the 'I' prefix for interfaces.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.DefaultTableNameResolver.ResolveTableName(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves the table name by making the type plural (+ 's', Product -> Products) and removing the 'I' prefix for interfaces.

member.name: T:Dommel.DommelMapper.ISqlBuilder
member.summary: Defines methods for building specialized SQL queries.

member.name: M:Dommel.DommelMapper.ISqlBuilder.BuildInsert(System.String,System.String[],System.String[],System.Reflection.PropertyInfo)
member.summary: Builds an insert query using the specified table name, column names and parameter names. A query to fetch the new id will be included as well.
member.param: The name of the table to query.
The names of the columns in the table.
The names of the parameters in the database command.
The key property. This can be used to query a specific column for the new id. This is optional.
member.returns: An insert query including a query to fetch the new id.
